mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yjd_user_credit_investigation_record( order_no, mobile_number, name, open_id, id_card, pay_show, create_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{mobileNumber}, #{name}, #{openId}, #{idCard}, #{payShow}, now() );
mapper.update: UPDATE yjd_user_credit_investigation_record SET pay_status = #{payStatus}, transaction_no=#{transactionNo}, charge_id=#{chargeId}, modify_time=now() WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT order_no, open_id, name, id_card, mobile_number, pay_status, pay_show, transaction_no, charge_id, create_time, modify_time FROM yjd_user_credit_investigation_record where order_no = #{orderNo}
